Justification: Buck is kidnapped from a pampered life, initiating his transformation.
He learns the law of club and fang, adapting to violence and survival.
Buck becomes dominant in the sled team, asserting his primal instincts.
He bonds with Thornton, temporarily reclaiming emotional attachment.
Thorntonâ€™s death breaks that bond and severs Buck from humanity.
Buck answers the call of the wild completely, shedding all domestic ties.
